liblonghorn.description: liblonghorn is a library that provides a simple interface to interact with Longhorn.

tgt.description: tgtd is a user-space daemon that provides SCSI target support.

spdk.description: SPDK is a storage performance development kit.

go-spdk-helper.description: go-spdk-helper is a Go wrapper for SPDK.

libjsonc.description: JSON-C is a JSON implementation in C.

nvme-cli.description: nvme-cli is a utility for managing NVMe devices.

nfs-ganesha.description: NFS-Ganesha is an NFSv3,v4,v4.1 fileserver that runs inside the longhorn-shared-manager pod.

ntirpc.description: ntirpc is a new transport-agnostic RPC library that is being developed as part of the NFS-Ganesha project.
